basics.name: Firas Hammami
basics.label: Biomodeler
basics.summary: I'm currently working at Novadiscovery as a Biomodeler. I'm building mathematical models representing diseases to simulate the impact of drugs on the diseases... On virtual patients! I really enjoy using mathematical models to understand better the complex biological regulation.

work.summary: I am working as a biomodeler, where I build mathematical models reproducing diseases in order to optimize clinical trials.
Taught Biostatistics to 3rd year students. I prepared courses and exams.
Taught various courses, including: Biostatistics, Oriented Objet Programming, Computer science for biology and Applied bioinformatics. I prepared courses and exams.
